title: Capacity-Building Course for ADDIE Model-Based Online Science English Education Design in Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational knowledge in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Targeting professionals in medical/legal/technical fields with advanced scientific expertise, aiming to acquire effective English teaching methodologies in online settings

learning_goals: Science-tailored online English lessons can be designed by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation)
Interactive science English learning content can be developed using CALL (Computer-Assisted Language Learning) tools
Formative assessment tools considering learners' professional competencies can be developed and applied
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
